start.hello:
Hi! I’m Upvise — your feed & page summarizer.
Pick a language so menus and summaries match it.
start.commands_hint: Use the menu or commands below:
help.text:
I can watch RSS or site homepages, find fresh items, and send short summaries in English/Persian.

Commands:
/start — Start
/add — Add site/feed
/list — List sources
/remove — Remove link
/lang — Choose language
/help — Help
list.title: 📜 Your feeds

add.feed_found_added: ✅ Found an RSS feed and added it.
add.already_added: ℹ️ This source is already added.
